craf.name: AdaptiveHelm
craf.add_attrs:
Combat Start: Gain different bonuses based on starting position.

Front Two Rows: 40 Armor and Magic Resist. Gain 1 Mana when struck by an attack.

Back Two Rows: 20 Ability Power. Gain 10 Mana every 3 seconds.

craf.name: ArcaneGauntlet
craf.add_attrs:
Abilities can critically strike.

If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.

craf.name: Bloodthirster
craf.add_attrs:
Gain 20% Omnivamp.

Once per combat: at 40% Health, gain a 25% maximum Health Shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt

craf.name: BlueSentinel
craf.add_attrs:
Max mana reduce by 10.

When the holder gets a takedown, they deal 8% more damage for 8 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: BrambleVest
craf.add_attrs:
Gain 5% max health.

Take 8% reduced damage from attacks. When struck by any attack, deal 100 magic damage to all adjacent enemies

Cooldown: 2 seconds

craf.name: Crownguard
craf.add_attrs:
Combat start: Gain a 30% max Health Shield for 8 seconds.
When the shield expires, gain 35 Ability Power.

craf.name: DragonsClaw
craf.add_attrs:
Gain 9% max health.

Every 2 seconds, heal 5% max Health.

craf.name: Evenshroud
craf.add_attrs:
30% Sunder enemies within 2 hexes. Gain 25 Armor and Magic Resist for the first 10 seconds of combat.

Sunder: Reduce Armor

craf.name: Fimbulwinter
craf.add_attrs: Once per combat: At 40% Health, gain a 25% max Health Shield that lasts 5 seconds and gain 20 Armor and 20 Magic Resist.

craf.name: GiantSlayer
craf.add_attrs: Deal 25% more damage to enemies with more than 1600 maximum Health.

craf.name: Guardbreaker
craf.add_attrs: After damaging a Shield, deal 25% more damage for 3 seconds.

craf.name: GuardianAngel
craf.add_attrs:
Once per combat: At 60% Health, briefly become untargetable and shed negative effects. Then, gain 15% bonus Attack Speed.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: GuinsoosRageblade
craf.add_attrs: Attacks grant 5% stacking Attack Speed.

craf.name: HandofJustice
craf.add_attrs:
Gain 2 effects:
* 15% Attack Damage and 15 Ability Power.
* 15% Omnivamp.

Each round, randomly double 1 of these effects.

Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt

craf.name: HextechGunblade
craf.add_attrs:
Gain 22% Omnivamp, which also heals the lowest percent Health ally

Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt

craf.name: InfinityEdge
craf.add_attrs:
Ability can critically strike.

If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.

craf.name: IonicSpark
craf.add_attrs:
30% Shred enemies within 2 hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, deal magic damage equal to 160% of their maximum Mana.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

craf.name: IronWill
craf.add_attrs: Gain 10 Armor and 10 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting the holder.

craf.name: LastWhisper
craf.add_attrs:
Physical damage 30% Sunders the target for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
Sunder: reduce Armor

craf.name: LordsEdge
craf.add_attrs: Deal 8% bonus damage.

craf.name: LudensEcho
craf.add_attrs: Combat start: Gain 30 Ability Power every 5 seconds.

craf.name: Morellonomicon
craf.add_attrs:
Attacks and Abilities deals 1% Burn and 33% Wound to enemies for 10 seconds.

[Unique - Only 1 Per Champion]
Burn: Deals a percent of the target's maximum Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

craf.name: NashorsTooth
craf.add_attrs: After casting an Ability, gain 40% Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

craf.name: Quicksilver
craf.add_attrs:
Combat start: Gain immunity to crowd control for 14 seconds. During this time, gain 4% Attack Speed every 2 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

craf.name: RabadonsDeathcap
craf.add_attrs: Deal 20% bonus damage.

craf.name: Redemption
craf.add_attrs: Heal allies within 1 hex for 15% of their missing Health every 5 seconds. They also take 10% less damage for 5 seconds (damage reduction does not stack).

craf.name: RunaansHurricane
craf.add_attrs: Attacks fire a bolt at a neaby enemy, dealing 55% Attack Damage as physical damage.

craf.name: SpearofShojin
craf.add_attrs: Attacks grant 5 bonus Mana.

craf.name: StatikkShiv
craf.add_attrs:
Every 3rd attack deal 35 magic damage and 30% Shreds 4 enemies for 5 seconds.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

craf.name: SteraksGage
craf.add_attrs: Once per combat at 60% Health, gain  20% max Health and 35% Attack Damage.

craf.name: SunfireCape
craf.add_attrs:
Every 2 seconds, deal 1% Burn and 33% Wound to an enemy within 2 hexes for 10 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
Burn: Deals a percent of the target's maximum Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

craf.name: ThiefsGloves
craf.add_attrs:
Each round: Equip 2 random items.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]

craf.name: TitansResolve
craf.add_attrs:
Gain 2% Attack Damage and 2 Ability Power when attacking or taking damage, stacking up to 25 times.

At full stacks, gain 20 Armor and Magic Resist.

craf.name: WarmogsArmor
craf.add_attrs: Gain 8% max health.

craf.name: RedBuffItem
craf.add_attrs:
Deal 6% bonus damage.

Attacks and Abilities 1% Burn and 33% Wound enemies for 5 seconds.

Burn: Deals a percent of the target's maximum Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

craf.name: SteadfastHeart
craf.add_attrs: Take 8% less damage. While above 50% Health, take 15% less damage, instead.

Each round: Equip 2 random Ornn items.

[Consumes 3 item slots]

arti.name: DeathfireGrasp
arti.add_attrs:
Combat start: Blast the current target for 20% of their max Health as magic damage.

For the next 10 seconds, deal 25% more damage. Damage dealt to the blasted target is increased to 35%.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

arti.name: DiamondHands
arti.add_attrs: Once per combat: At 50% Health, become invulnerable for 1.5 seconds and grant 1 gold.

arti.name: GamblersBlade
arti.add_attrs:
Grant 1% bonus Attack Speed per gold in your bank (up to 30 gold).

Each attack has a 4% chance to drop 1 gold.

arti.name: GoldmancersStaff
arti.add_attrs: Grant 1 Ability Power per gold in your bank (up to 30 gold) and a 40% chance to drop 1 gold on enemy kill.

arti.name: Hullcrusher
arti.add_attrs: Combat start: If there are no adjacent allies, gain 600 Health.

arti.name: MogulsMail
arti.add_attrs:
Grants 1 Armor, 1 Magic Resist, and 6 Health when taking damage, stacking up to 40 times.

At full stacks, grant 2 gold.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemDeathsDance
arti.add_attrs:
Gain a 25% Omnivamp. 50% of the damage the holder receives is instead dealt over 4 seconds as non-lethal damage.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemEverfrost
arti.add_attrs:
Enemies who damage the holder are 20% Chilled for 1.5 seconds. After 7 Chills from this them, the attacker is Stunned instead. (Cooldown: 15 seconds).

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemMuramana
arti.add_attrs:
Once per combat: After casting an Ability, restore 120 mana over 5 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemTheCollector
arti.add_attrs:
Attacks and Abilities execute enemies below 12% of their max Health. Executions have a 45% chance to drop 1 gold .

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemTrinityForce
arti.add_attrs: Health +250, Mana +25, Attack Damage +25%, Ability Power +25, Armor +25, Magic Resist +25, Attack Speed +25%

arti.name: OrnnItemZhonyasHourglass
arti.add_attrs:
Once per combat: At 40% Health, become invulnerable for 3 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: SnipersFocus
arti.add_attrs: Gain +1 Attack range. Damage is increasedy by 9% for each hex between the holder and their target.

arti.name: TrickstersGlass
arti.add_attrs:
Summon a clone with 70% maximum Health and 30% increased max Mana. You cannot equip items to the clone.

The clone benefits from active traits.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

supp.name: AegisoftheLegion
supp.add_attrs:
Combat start: Grant 30% Attack Speed and 15 Armor and Magic Resist to the holder, adjacent allies, and all allies behind them for 12 seconds.

​​[Support item]

supp.name: BansheesVeil
supp.add_attrs:
Combat Start: Grant the holder and all allies within 1 hexes in the same row immunity to crowd control and 25% Attack Speed for 18 seconds

[Support item] [Unique - only 1 per champion]

supp.name: Chalice
supp.add_attrs:
Combat start: Grant 25 Ability Power and 10 Mana to the holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row.

[Support item]

supp.name: LocketoftheIronSolari
supp.add_attrs:
Combat start: The holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain a 250 Shield, 20 Armor, and 20 Magic Resist for 20 seconds.

[Support Item]

supp.name: NeedlesslyBigGem
supp.add_attrs:
If the holder is alive after 15 seconds of combat, gain 1 gold per 2 living allies and grant living allies 30% bonus damage.

​​[Support item]

supp.name: OrnnItemBlackCleaver
supp.add_attrs:
Damage dealt 30% Shres and 30% Sunders enemies for 15 seconds.

​​Your team gains 8% Attack Damage and 8 Ability Power.

[Support item] [Unique - Only One Per Champion]
Shred: reduce Magic Resist
Sunder: reduce Armor

supp.name: OrnnItemRanduinsOmen
supp.add_attrs:
Combat start: Grant 30 Armor and 30 Magic Resistance to the holder and adjacent allies.

[Support item]

supp.name: Shroud
supp.add_attrs:
Combat Start: Shoot a beam that 30% Mana Reaves enemies.
Your team gains 60 Health.

[Support item] [Unique - only 1 per champion]
Mana Reave: increase maximum Mana until the next cast

supp.name: VirtueoftheMartyr
supp.add_attrs:
Every 5 seconds, heal your team for 6.5% of their max Health. When the holder dies, the healing increases to 13% max Health and continues for 10 seconds.

​​[Support item]

supp.name: ZekesHerald
supp.add_attrs:
Combat start: Grant 30% Attack Speed to the holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row.

[Support item]

supp.name: Zephyr
supp.add_attrs:
Combat start: Summon a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds.

Your team gains 8% Attack Speed.

​​[Support item]
[Ignores crowd control immunity.]
[Unique - only 1 per champion]

supp.name: ZzRotPortal
supp.add_attrs:
Combat start: Summon a large Voidspawn that forces nearby enemies to attack it.

​​[Support item]

spec.name: ForceofNature
spec.attrs: Your team gains +1 maximum team size.
